# fitted(to:eventHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Fits a max abs scaler to a sequence of elements.

## Declaration

```swift
func fitted<S>(to input: S, eventHandler: EventHandler? = nil) throws -> MaxAbsScaler<Element>.Transformer where Element == S.Element, S : Sequence
```

## Parameters

- **input**: A sequence of elements.
- **eventHandler**: An event handler.

## Return Value

The fitted transformer.
title: fitted(to:eventHandler:)
